00038 void cMovementRecogniser::clear()
00039 {
00040         if( m_devicesArray )
00041         {
00042                 for( unsigned int i=0; i<m_nbDevices; i++ )
00043                 {
00044                         delete [] m_devicesArray[ i ].m_array;
00045                 }
00046 
00047                 delete [] m_devicesArray;
00048                 m_devicesArray = NULL;
00049         }
00050 
00051         m_nbDevices = 0;
00052         m_maxMovementSize = 0;
00053 }

00060 bool cMovementRecogniser::initialise( unsigned int nbDevices,                   
00061                                                                           unsigned int maxMovementSize )        
00062 {
00063         // check inputs
00064         if( 0 == nbDevices ||
00065                 2 >= maxMovementSize )
00066         {
00067                 return false;
00068         }
00069 
00070         m_nbDevices = nbDevices;
00071         m_maxMovementSize = maxMovementSize;
00072 
00073         if( m_devicesArray ) {
00074                 delete [] m_devicesArray;
00075         }
00076 
00077         m_devicesArray = new sDeviceMovement[ nbDevices ];
00078         for( unsigned int i=0; i<nbDevices; i++ )
00079         {
00080                 m_devicesArray[ i ].m_array = new cVector3int[ maxMovementSize ];
00081                 m_devicesArray[ i ].m_currentState = eMovementNone;
00082                 m_devicesArray[ i ].m_idStartMov   = 0;
00083                 m_devicesArray[ i ].m_idEndMov     = 0;
00084                 // Initialise the last acceleration to have a "past vector" to compare when comparing the first vector for the first time
00085                 m_devicesArray[ i ].m_array[ maxMovementSize-1 ] = cVector3int(128, 128, 128+25); 
00086         }
00087 
00088         return true;
00089 }

00096 bool cMovementRecogniser::isReady() const
00097 {
00098         if( NULL == m_devicesArray      ||
00099                 0 == m_nbDevices                ||
00100                 0 == m_maxMovementSize  )
00101         {
00102                 return false;
00103         }
00104 
00105         return true;
00106 }

00113 cMovementRecogniser::eMovementState cMovementRecogniser::addAcceleration( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId,          
00114                                                                                                                                                   const cVector3int &acceleration )     
00115 {
00116         // check initialisation
00117         if( isReady() == false ) {
00118                 return eMovementERROR;
00119         }
00120 
00121         // check inputs
00122         if( deviceId >= m_nbDevices ){
00123                 return eMovementERROR;
00124         }
00125         
00126         sDeviceMovement* ptDevice = &m_devicesArray[ deviceId ];
00127 
00128         if( ptDevice->m_currentState != eMovementManualInProgress       &&
00129                 ptDevice->m_currentState != eMovementManualOutOfBuffer  ) 
00130         {
00131                 return process( deviceId, acceleration );
00132         }
00133 
00134         // manual recognition
00135         unsigned int nextPosMov = ptDevice->m_idEndMov + 1;
00136         if(     ptDevice->m_currentState == eMovementManualOutOfBuffer ) {
00137                 nextPosMov = 0;
00138                 ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementManualInProgress;
00139         }
00140 
00141         ptDevice->m_array[ ptDevice->m_idEndMov ] = acceleration;
00142         if( nextPosMov == m_maxMovementSize )
00143         {
00144                 ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementManualOutOfBuffer;
00145                 ptDevice->m_idEndMov = 0;
00146         }
00147         else
00148         {
00149                 ptDevice->m_idEndMov = nextPosMov;
00150         }
00151 
00152 
00153         return ptDevice->m_currentState;
00154 }

00161 cMovementRecogniser::eMovementState cMovementRecogniser::getState( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId  
00162                                                                                                                                    ) const
00163 {
00164         // check initialisation
00165         if( isReady() == false ) {
00166                 return eMovementERROR;
00167         }
00168 
00169         // check inputs
00170         if( deviceId >= m_nbDevices ){
00171                 return eMovementERROR;
00172         }
00173 
00174         return m_devicesArray[ deviceId ].m_currentState;
00175 }

00178 
00182 bool cMovementRecogniser::getMovement( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId, 
00183                                                                            cMovement* ptMovement                
00184                                                                            ) const
00185 {
00186         // check initialisation
00187         if( isReady() == false ) {
00188                 return false;
00189         }
00190 
00191         // check inputs
00192         if( deviceId >= m_nbDevices     ||
00193                 NULL == ptMovement              )
00194         {
00195                 return false;
00196         }
00197 
00198         sDeviceMovement* ptDevice = &m_devicesArray[ deviceId ];
00199 
00200         // Data is comprised between Start and End, Start included, End excluded
00201         // Two solution : 
00202         // Packed :   [   SXXXXE   ]
00203         // or
00204         // Unpacked : [XXE      SXX]
00205         // (S : Start, E: End, X: Data)
00206 
00207         const unsigned int sizeMov = ( ptDevice->m_idEndMov > ptDevice->m_idStartMov ) ? 
00208                                                                                 ptDevice->m_idEndMov - ptDevice->m_idStartMov: 
00209                                                                                 m_maxMovementSize - (ptDevice->m_idStartMov - ptDevice->m_idEndMov); 
00210         if( 0 == sizeMov ) {
00211                 return false;
00212         }
00213 
00214         cVector3int* buffer = new cVector3int [ sizeMov ];
00215         if( ptDevice->m_idStartMov < ptDevice->m_idEndMov )
00216         {
00217                 // Packed
00218                 memcpy( buffer, &ptDevice->m_array[ptDevice->m_idStartMov] , sizeof(cVector3int)*sizeMov );
00219         }
00220         else
00221         {
00222                 unsigned int sizePart1 = m_maxMovementSize-ptDevice->m_idStartMov;
00223                 // Unpacked, part 1 
00224                 memcpy( buffer, &ptDevice->m_array[ptDevice->m_idStartMov], sizeof(cVector3int)*sizePart1 );
00225                 // Unpacked, part 2
00226                 memcpy( buffer+sizePart1, ptDevice->m_array, sizeof(cVector3int)*ptDevice->m_idEndMov );
00227         }
00228 
00229         bool bRes = ptMovement->initialise( sizeMov, buffer );
00230         delete [] buffer;
00231         return bRes;
00232 }

00242 bool cMovementRecogniser::manualRecognitionStart( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId ) 
00243 {
00244         // check initialisation
00245         if( isReady() == false ) {
00246                 return false;
00247         }
00248 
00249         // check inputs
00250         if( deviceId >= m_nbDevices ){
00251                 return false;
00252         }
00253         
00254         sDeviceMovement* ptDevice = &m_devicesArray[ deviceId ];
00255         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementManualInProgress;
00256         ptDevice->m_idStartMov = 0;
00257         ptDevice->m_idEndMov = 0;
00258 
00259         return true;
00260 }

00269 bool cMovementRecogniser::manualRecognitionStop( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId,   
00270                                                                                                  cMovement* ptMovement )                
00271 {
00272         // check initialisation
00273         if( isReady() == false ) {
00274                 return false;
00275         }
00276 
00277         // check inputs
00278         if( deviceId >= m_nbDevices     ||
00279                 NULL == ptMovement              )
00280         {
00281                 return false;
00282         }
00283 
00284         sDeviceMovement* ptDevice = &m_devicesArray[ deviceId ];
00285 
00286         // Only something that has started may be stopped
00287         if( ptDevice->m_currentState != eMovementManualInProgress       &&
00288                 ptDevice->m_currentState != eMovementManualOutOfBuffer  ) 
00289         {
00290                 return false;
00291         }
00292 
00293         if( ptDevice->m_idEndMov == ptDevice->m_idStartMov ) {  
00294                 ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementNone;
00295                 return false;
00296         }
00297 
00298         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementManualFinished;
00299         return ptMovement->initialise( ptDevice->m_idEndMov, ptDevice->m_array );
00300 }

00303 
00308 cMovementRecogniser::eMovementState cMovementRecogniser::process( const tAGRDeviceId deviceId,
00309                                                                                                                                   const cVector3int &acceleration )
00310 {
00311         // Feel free to change these values !
00312         static const unsigned int DIST_THRESHOLD                        = 12*12;
00313         //static const unsigned int GRAVITY_THRESHOLD                   = 25*25;
00314         //static const unsigned int GRAVITY_THRESHOLD_DELTA     = 5*5;
00315         static const unsigned int MINIMUM_MOVEMENT_SIZE         = 5;
00316 
00317         sDeviceMovement* ptDevice = &m_devicesArray[ deviceId ];
00318 
00319         // When needed, set movement start pointer for a new list
00320         if( eMovementFinished    == ptDevice->m_currentState    ||
00321                 eMovementOutOfBuffer == ptDevice->m_currentState        )
00322         {
00323                 ptDevice->m_idStartMov = ptDevice->m_idEndMov;
00324         }
00325 
00326         // Get the previous vector
00327         const unsigned int prevIndex = (ptDevice->m_idEndMov != 0) ? ptDevice->m_idEndMov-1 : m_maxMovementSize-1 ;
00328         cVector3int prevVec = ptDevice->m_array[ prevIndex ];
00329 
00330         // Store the new one
00331         ptDevice->m_array[ ptDevice->m_idEndMov ] = acceleration;
00332         ptDevice->m_idEndMov = (ptDevice->m_idEndMov+1 < m_maxMovementSize) ? ptDevice->m_idEndMov+1 : 0 ;
00333 //      const unsigned int nextIndex = (ptDevice->m_idEndMov+1 < m_maxMovementSize) ? ptDevice->m_idEndMov+1 : 0 ;
00334 
00335         // Square distance with the previous acceleration
00336         const cVector3int diffVector =  acceleration - prevVec;
00337         const unsigned int squareDist = diffVector.x*diffVector.x + 
00338                                                                         diffVector.y*diffVector.y +
00339                                                                         diffVector.z*diffVector.z ;
00340 
00341         // Square distance with the center (situated at 128,128,128 with the wiimote)
00342         //const cVector3int accZeroed = acceleration - cVector3int( 128, 128, 128 );
00343         //const int squareAcceration = accZeroed.x*accZeroed.x + accZeroed.y*accZeroed.y + accZeroed.z*accZeroed.z;
00344 
00345         //if( squareDist > DIST_THRESHOLD                                                                                       ||
00346         //      ( squareAcceration > (GRAVITY_THRESHOLD+GRAVITY_THRESHOLD_DELTA) ||
00347         //        squareAcceration < (GRAVITY_THRESHOLD-GRAVITY_THRESHOLD_DELTA) )      )
00348         if( squareDist > DIST_THRESHOLD )
00349         {
00350                 if( eMovementInProgress != ptDevice->m_currentState ) 
00351                 {
00352                         ptDevice->m_idStartMov = prevIndex;
00353                         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementInProgress;
00354                 }
00355                 else if( ptDevice->m_idEndMov == ptDevice->m_idStartMov )
00356                 {
00357                         // Next turn will be out of buffer !
00358                         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementOutOfBuffer;
00359                 }
00360                 else
00361                 {
00362                         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementInProgress;
00363                 }
00364         }
00365         else
00366         {
00367         const unsigned int sizeMov = ( ptDevice->m_idEndMov > ptDevice->m_idStartMov ) ? 
00368                                                                                 ptDevice->m_idEndMov - ptDevice->m_idStartMov : 
00369                                                                                 m_maxMovementSize - (ptDevice->m_idStartMov - ptDevice->m_idEndMov) ;
00370 
00371                 // The movement can be either finished, or no movement has been detected
00372                 // also, if the movement is too small, it is discarded
00373                 if( sizeMov >= MINIMUM_MOVEMENT_SIZE                                            &&
00374                         ( eMovementInProgress  == ptDevice->m_currentState ||
00375                           eMovementOutOfBuffer == ptDevice->m_currentState )    )
00376                 {
00377                         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementFinished;
00378                         ptDevice->m_idEndMov = (ptDevice->m_idEndMov != 0) ? ptDevice->m_idEndMov-1 : m_maxMovementSize-1 ;
00379                 }
00380                 else
00381                 {
00382                         ptDevice->m_currentState = eMovementNone;
00383                 }
00384         }
00385 
00386         return ptDevice->m_currentState;
00387 }
